title: New: Let's Away – You & I / Brittle Bones
body:
Photo: Ian West

Having witnessed **Let’s Away’s** thoroughly successful debut live performance at May’s Evolution Emerging Festival, I’ve been eagerly awaiting the arrival of more material.

New EP titled **_The Brittle Bones of Let’s Away_** is a marked progression, with the two tracks _You & I_ and _Brittle Bones_ showcasing the tender yet poignant element that made their live performance so invigorating. Built upon drunken romances, misleading glances and overpowering heartache, _You & I_ is a 60’s ballad in all it’s silky glory whilst the sombre _Brittle Bones_ dives into a sea of melancholy, fumbling for that final chance to reminisce and retrieve. Early days it may be, but these two tracks mark **Let’s Away** out as not just bright stars in the North East, but for the rest of the UK as well.
